text: is there a way to bulk add people in our agency to client accounts in HubSpot?
And an option to bulk add/remove from all accounts :slightly_smiling_face:
we just created a team@ email, that we had to all portals. We have a team@ for people that need to update content, design manager, etc. then a team-admin@ that has full admin access to the portal
then everyone just logs in under one account or the other according to what we're doing.
Was the code for the comment form changed at all?
meaning the classes and id's of the form
I just noticed that our comment form styling is messed up

<@U98Q2GNL9> beware that going that route you lose who did what in revisions. Think I’ve run into another issue regarding editing pages at the same time with that and it was worse than if you tried to edit the same page but using different accounts.
I’ve noticed issues with the comment forms lately too. not sure if styling or html was changed. I know I’ve seen issues with the captchas(think HS fixed the captcha issues though)

<@U7SL518D6> thanks for that. From what I've seen HubSpot doesn't handle well users being in the same page/file anyways. So we have a check-in/check-out policy. Whenever you are editing a file you just message the team in that projects channel that you are checking out a file/page, then you check in. Best I could come up with, with so many hands in the cookie jar
yea i think the html mark up was changed cause our styling was stripped. so I need to target it differently now

that’s a good system.

One thing we’ve done here is with css files and js files, if multiple devs are going to work on a site we initially split the files into a file per person, then we merge em all in the end. Though we haven’t really done that with design manager 2 since a lot of code goes right into the modules themselves.
looks like form is no longer `id="comment-form"`
